Text:
can you tell me the purpose of double posting all your movies under diffrent names

http://thepiratebay.org/user/scenebalance/
http://thepiratebay.org/user/TvTeam/

@johnnyrep most of these VIP accounts are for various other websites which use TPB tracker for their torrents and post scene releases movies etc, just because it has the same name dont mean it's been uploaded by the same people, the file name they use is from the original release, the different accounts uploading it are different ppl running different sites with their own users who know and trust that site and they post the release with its original name. Most scene releases are posted by multiple accounts and in RAR and non RAR versions. Pls try and remember that a lot of people use TPB tracker for their own websites and their downloaders may not even visit this site.
